parameters.name: ThicknessDirection
parameters.description: Direction of thickness as defined in swBoundaryBossDirection_e

title: IBoundaryBossFeatureData.ThinFeatureThickness
description: Gets or sets the thickness of this thin feature boundary feature.

parameters.name: ThicknessDirection
parameters.description: Direction of thickness as defined in swBoundaryBossDirection_e

returns: Thickness of this thin feature boundary feature
remarks:
Before calling this property, call
IBoundaryBossFeatureData::IsThinFeature
to determine if the boundary feature is a thin feature.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
